game.title: Defeat the Dragon
game.objective: Defeat the giant dragon terrorizing the city.
game.description: You must journey through the treacherous mountains to the dragon's den, defeat it and bring back proof.

task.description: Before going into the battle, you need to find the hermit prophet who can guide you on this journey.
Journey across the mountains and reach the dragon's den.
Engage in battle with the dragon and defeat it.
